import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-terms-of-service', templateUrl: './terms-of-service.component.html', styleUrls: ['./terms-of-service.component.css'] }) export class TermsOfServiceComponent { }
Wanderlust - Terms of Service

Terms of Service

These terms and conditions outline the rules and regulations for the use of Wanderlust's Website.

1. Acceptance of Terms

By accessing or using the Wanderlust website, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you must not use the website.

2. Intellectual Property Rights

The content on the Wanderlust website, including text, images, logos, and trademarks, is protected by intellectual property rights and is the property of Wanderlust or its licensors.

3. User Conduct

When using the Wanderlust website, you agree to abide by the following rules of conduct:

  • Do not engage in any unlawful, abusive, or harmful behavior.
  • Do not post any defamatory, offensive, or misleading content.
  • Do not violate the privacy or intellectual property rights of others.
  • Do not attempt to gain unauthorized access to the website or its systems.

4. Limitations of Liability

Wanderlust shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, or consequential damages arising out of or in connection with the use of the website.

5. Governing Law

These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of your jurisdiction.
